title: Sediment Pollution in Two Streams Diagram

content.prompt: Based on the diagram, which of the following most likely led to the differences in the amount of sediment in the two branches of the river?

choices.label: The overuse of fertilizers in agriculture
Effluent from a sewage treatment plant
Use of heavy equipment in building construction

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe characteristics of an environmental concept, process, or model represented visually.
